subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Fremont park, projected to open in 2011 if all permits are granted, will be filled with high-tech gadgetry but could pose traffic problems for Oakland Athletic fans.
snippet: The Fremont park, projected to open in 2011 if all permits are granted, will be filled with high-tech gadgetry but could pose traffic problems for Oakland Athletic fans.
